statements: SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_amount FROM research_projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT * FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, funding_amount ASC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, funding_amount FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY funding_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE project_description LIKE '%health%'
SELECT researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT finding_description, finding_date FROM research_findings WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(finding_id) AS total_findings FROM research_findings GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(finding_id) > 5;
SELECT project_name, finding_description FROM research_projects JOIN research_findings ON research_projects.project_id = research_findings.project_id WHERE finding_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_members WHERE role = 'Researcher' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT finding_id, finding_description FROM research_findings WHERE finding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';

SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date, member_name, role FROM research_projects JOIN project_members ON research_projects.project_id = project_members.project_id WHERE role = 'Researcher' ORDER BY end_date;

SELECT project_id, project_name, finding_description, finding_date FROM research_projects LEFT JOIN research_findings ON research_projects.project_id = research_findings.project_id WHERE finding_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date, MIN(start_date) AS earliest_start_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT finding_description, observation_date FROM Finding JOIN Observation ON Finding.finding_id = Observation.finding_id WHERE Observation.observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT observation_location, observation_notes FROM Observation ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT finding_description FROM Finding WHERE project_id = 3 AND researcher_id = 4;
SELECT observation_date, observation_location, observation_notes FROM Observation WHERE finding_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_findings WHERE finding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT researchers.researcher_name, research_team.role FROM researchers JOIN research_team ON researchers.researcher_id = research_team.researcher_id WHERE research_team.project_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM research_locations WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%technology%');

SELECT project_name, project_description, COUNT(finding_id) AS total_findings FROM research_projects LEFT JOIN project_findings ON research_projects.project_id = project_findings.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
